title: "U.S. Greenhouse Gas Center: Data Flow Diagrams"

Welcome to the homepage for [U.S. Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Center](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter) data flow diagrams. These diagrams summarize the process a dataset goes through from acquisition to integration in the U.S. GHG Center.

Click on a dataset name to view the data flow diagram for that dataset.

[View the US GHG Center Data Catalog](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter/data-catalog)
